text: Mt. Diablo Unified School District says it will begin the school year with distance learning due to the ongoing pandemic. The Board of Education made the decision unanimously at a Monday meeting and plans will be finalized in the coming weeks. https://t.co/tfUvMrWe7Z

text: There’s no reason to play “The Star-Spangled Banner” at sporting events, especially before empty stands during the pandemic. It’s time to put the grand old tradition on the shelf and unveil it only at the most appropriate times. Writes @bruce_jenkins1 https://t.co/DdDhX6Kn2l

text: Burglaries shot up the most at 53.6%, with 1,644 reported incidents last year and 2,526 this year. Arson went up 51.4% and motor vehicle thefts saw an overall increase of 27.7%. https://t.co/UGDzMoXvbB
